name: Aisha Thompson
summary: Human Resources Business Partner with 10+ years of experience in talent management, organizational development, and employee relations. Proven track record of implementing HR strategies that drive business results and enhance employee experience.

experience.title: Senior HR Business Partner
responsibilities: Partner with C-suite and department heads to align HR strategy with business objectives
Lead talent acquisition for engineering organization, reducing time-to-hire by 30%
Designed and implemented performance management system for 500+ employees
Reduced voluntary turnover by 15% through retention initiatives and career development programs
Manage employee relations issues, conducting investigations and providing guidance to managers
Lead diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives resulting in 25% increase in diverse hires

experience.title: HR Business Partner
responsibilities: Facilitated organizational restructuring and change management initiatives
Conducted training sessions on performance management and leadership development
Partnered with legal team on compliance and employment law matters
Managed annual compensation review process and promotion cycles

experience.title: HR Generalist
responsibilities: Managed full-cycle recruitment for hourly and salaried positions
Administered benefits programs and conducted open enrollment sessions
Maintained HRIS system and generated HR analytics reports

education.degree: Master of Science in Human Resource Management
